meanings.definition: The act of giving birth to a calf.
meanings.sent1: The farmer observed the calving of a new calf in the barn.
meanings.sent2: The calving season is a busy time for ranchers.
meanings.sent3: The calving of the calf brought joy to the farm.
meanings.sent4: The calving process is a natural miracle of life.
meanings.sent5: The calving of the calf was a heartwarming sight.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking off chunks of ice from a glacier or iceberg.
meanings.sent1: The calving of icebergs can be a spectacular sight.
meanings.sent2: Climate change can accelerate the calving of glaciers.
meanings.sent3: The calving of ice chunks made the polar bear's day.
meanings.sent4: The calving of ice symbolizes the ever-changing nature of our planet.
meanings.sent5: The calving of glaciers is a reminder of Earth's power.
